Office Assistant

Full-time Position • Redwood City, CA

Apply Now

Mayfield Robotics is a startup working on creating an adorable home robot. Our team is small and growing quickly. We are wholly owned by a large company, but are operating independently. It is like a typical startup in terms of speed and growth but without the distraction of fundraising. The atmosphere around the office is energetic, casual, and nerdy. We like to build robots and stay close to our customers. We recently moved offices and are located in Redwood City right off 101.

Role

You will be joining our Ops Team consisting of the: Office Manager, Facilities Coordinator, Executive Assistant and People Operations Coordinator. We are looking for an Office Assistant to take care of our visitors and the team. The essence of the role is being the bright, positive presence that makes everyone feel welcome and taken care of. This role is the face of the company. If you've worked in customer service and enjoyed it, this is a great opportunity for you. Being energetic, very dependable, and punctual are essential, as the team will count on you.

Running our facility well keeps the good vibe going. A big element of that is greeting our guests professionally, keeping the office tidy, and the kitchen (especially the overly-complicated coffee machinery) in great shape.

Requirements

  • Experience opening and/or closing an office
  • Be an excellent communicator both verbally and written
  • Computer wizardry is not required, but being comfortable using Macs and Google Apps is
  • Interest in working at a fast-paced start-up
  • Must be on time, reliable, honest, trustworthy and proactive
  • Ability to handle confidential information with complete discretion is critical
  • An enthusiasm to work with people on a consistent basis
  • Must have strong customer service, a flexible approach to tasks and an ability to work well within a team environment
  • Must be able to lift/move approximately 40 pounds

Responsibilities

  • Greet and make our visitors feel welcome, including giving them a badge
  • Answer office phone - screen and direct calls, and deliver messages to team
  • Send and receive mail and packages
  • Help team with conference room booking, calendar scheduling and travel

Details

  • Full-time, on-site job in Redwood City (no remote work)
  • Hours are 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM, Monday through Friday
  • Non-exempt position
  • Full benefits including: health/dental/vision, paid holidays, gym membership, laundry/dry cleaning and 401k

How to Apply

If you've made it this far and are intrigued, please send a resume and a short note telling us about your favorite caffeinated beverage to jobs+oa@mayfieldrobotics.com.

Mayfield Robotics is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer committed to diversity in the workplace. M/F/V/D

Apply Now

We are a growing team of engineers, roboticists, and designers, currently building our first home robot  in lovely Redwood City, CA.
